titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania LJS 436: Ḍawʼ al-sirāj.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts

msContents.summary: 14th-century copy of a late 13th-century manual on the mathematics of the Islamic law of inheritance, in the form of a paragraph by paragraph commentary on the Farāʼiḍ al-Sirājīyah of 12th-century legal and mathematical scholar Sirāj al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Sajāwandī.

author.persName: Faraḍī, Maḥmūd ibn Abī Bakr, 1246 or 1247-1300

supportDesc.extent: 123 leaves : 179 x 127 (134-143 x 88) mm bound to 179 x 139 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, i + 123 leaves; [i, 1-123]; alternating gatherings of 10 and 6 leaves.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink, mostly unpointed, by at least 2 hands (first hand, f. 1v-56v, 104v-120v; second hand, 57r-104r), with an additional leaf bound in, f. 63.

decoDesc.decoNote: Diagrams (f. 43v-46r, 111r-111v, 114v-117r) and tables (105r-110r, 112r-114r, 118v-120v) in red and black ink; title page text in red and black ink (f. 1r); occasional words and phrases in red ink; double frame of red ink around text block and double red lines between sections on final pages of manuscript (f. 104v-120v).

binding.p: Morocco with flap (Type II), faded marbled paper overlay on covers.

origin.p: Sections of the copy dated to different times, though signed by the same scribe. First section dated 10 Rabīʻ al-Awwal 723 (27 March 1373) (f. 104r), end of the book dated Rajab 724 (July 1324) (f. 118r), and the added pages after the end dated Ramaḍān 747 (December 1346-January 1347) (f. 122r). The scribe is Masʻūd ibn Qāsim ibn Aḥmad ibn Masʻūd (f. 118r) with the added nisbah al-Shīrānī [?] (f. 104r).

history.provenance: Sold by Sam Fogg Ltd. (London) to Lawrence J. Schoenberg, Jun. 2002.
Deposit by Lawrence J. Schoenberg and Barbara Brizdle, 2011.

keywords.term: Inheritance and succession (Islamic law)--Early works to 1800
